item.title: Help me where to put this code?
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

Quote from: `Rich on Today at 07:24:27 am
That code needs to go inside of the process method.

What is the process method? I’m still a noob in these things…

Do you mean public void process() { ?

I added it inside it and it gives again those 3 errors :mad:
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 16, 2008, 12:18:29 am[/size][hr][quote=“Fiirë, post:1, topic:238233”][hr]Yeah ok be assholes and dont fucking help me. God i don’t like this fucking unhelpful community. PISS OFF[/quote]Yeah, I have bumped this thread 3 times and no replies or answers :mad:

item.title: Help me where to put this code?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client person = (client)p; if (p != null && person != null) { if (p != null && person != null) { if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) <= 20 && p.heightLevel == npcs[i].heightLevel) { if (npcs[i].npcType == 2745 || npcs[i].npcType == 941) { npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId; npcs[i].RandomWalk = false; npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true; } else if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 21 || person.heightLevel != npcs[i].heightLevel) { npcs[i].RandomWalk = true; } } } } }

Read full topic
item.source: Help me where to put this code?

item.title: Help me where to put this code?
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

I was trying to add this npc agression code to my server, but it gives 100 errors. I don’t know what’s wrong with it so can someone fix this code for me? for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person != null) { if(p != null && person != null) { if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) <= 20 && p.heightLevel == npcs[i].heightLevel) if (npcs[i].npcType == 2745 || npcs[i].npcType == 941) npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId; npcs[i].RandomWalk = false; npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true; } else if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 21 || person.heightLevel != npcs[i].heightLevel) if (npcs[i].npcType == 2745 || npcs[i].npcType == 941) { npcs[i].RandomWalk = true; } } } }

I search for: for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
And add it under the last }

Ok, where do I exactly put this: for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client person = (client)p; if (p != null && person != null) { if (p != null && person != null) { if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) <= 20 && p.heightLevel == npcs[i].heightLevel) { if (npcs[i].npcType == 2745 || npcs[i].npcType == 941) { npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId; npcs[i].RandomWalk = false; npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true; } else if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 21 || person.heightLevel != npcs[i].heightLevel) { npcs[i].RandomWalk = true; } } } } }

Read full topic
